snippet.title: Casanova (Iber Software/Topo Soft) (1989) (Amstrad CPC)
snippet.description:
(Scroll Down for English Description)
Divertido y preciosista plataformas desarrollado por Topo y distribuído a través de Iber, que originalmente iba a llamarse "Pizza e Pasta".

En este juego tenemos que recuperar un número de máscaras venecianas para poder acceder a la siguiente zona, a la que se nos trasladará en góndola.

El único problema de la versión de Amstrad CPC es que no se distinguen, o no funcionan, los señalizadores que marcan donde se encuentra la próxima máscara.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Funny and precious platform game developed by Topo and distributed by Iber, which was originally to be called "Pizza e Pasta".

In this game we have to recover a number of Venetian masks to gain access to the next area, to which we will travel by gondola.

The only problem with Amstrad CPC version of  is that the markers that mark where the next mask is are indistinguishable, or do not work.

Funny and precious platform game developed by Topo and distributed by Iber, which was originally to be called "Pizza e Pasta".

In this game we have to recover a number of Venetian masks to gain access to the next area, to which we will travel by gondola.

The only problem with Amstrad CPC version of  is that the markers that mark where the next mask is are indistinguishable, or do not work.
